title: Bug 15108Add import deletes code
SR: Build 200205011) Create a class "TestingFoo" in package "Testing".2) In another package, create a class and method and type "TestingFoo".3) With the cursor at the end of "TestingFoo", hit Ctrl+Shift+M to add theimport.It deletes part of the class name, and all that's left is "oo".I guess it does a match against the package name, and since the package name isa prefix of the class name, it incorrectly deletes part of the class name.
